name: Strawberry Rhubarb Fields
description: Strawberry, rhubarb, and a hint of tarragon, paired with tequila, a little lemon juice and simple syrup, create a juicy cocktail that nicely balances sweet and tart.

recipeInstructions.text: In the bottom of a cocktail shaker, muddle the rhubarb and simple syrup until the rhubarb has broken down, about 15 hearty muddles. Add the strawberries and gently muddle until they break down. Add tarragon and tap gently about 5 times.
Fill shaker with ice and add simple syrup, tequila, and lemon juice. Shake well, about 15 seconds. Double strain into a cocktail glass and garnish with a strawberry slice.
